name: The Die Is Cast (itch) (Odyssée)
description:
Go on an adventure !

The Die Is Cast is an interactive fiction set in a medieval-fantasy universe. You will have to balance your skills and make the right decisions to survive the scenario and reach your goal.

Discover the world of role-playing

The Die Is Cast takes you into the world of role-playing games.

  • Build your character sheet by balancing your three skills: strength, knowledge and social.  
  • Go on an adventure in an immersive medieval-fantasy universe. 
  • Make the right decisions and influence the scenario.
  • Roll the die to see if your actions are successes or failures.

When you have finished the game, retry the adventure by taking other paths to discover new stories.
